TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ButtonBaseAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer

Docs.summary: Represents a base class for exposing elements derived from to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase owner) cil managed

Docs.param: The that is associated with this peer.
Docs.summary: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetAcceleratorKeyCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the accelerator key for the element associated with this . Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A>.
Docs.returns: A string containing the accelerator key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetAutomationIdCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> for the element associated with this . Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property, and if that isn't set, it's the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetNameCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the class of the element associated with this . Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the class name, minus the accelerator key.
